Name: Video Game Trivia
About the game: How well do you know your video game trivia? Test your video game knowledge in Video Game Trivia! Video Game Trivia has never been so much fun. Challenge yourself or have a video game trivia night with friends and family in Party Mode. It comes with the most popular video game categories including Arcade, Atari, Nintendo, Personal Computer, PlayStation, SEGA, and Xbox! Video Game Trivia includes high quality graphics and covers the most popular categories: - Arcade - Atari - Nintendo - Personal Computer - PlayStation - SEGA - Xbox FEATURES - Includes the Most Popular Video Game Categories. - High Quality Graphics. - Party Mode (2-4 players locally). - Gamepad Support. - Family Friendly. - Fun for all ages. So what are you waiting for? Download it now and get your brain ready for Video Game Trivia!
